name: Beauty Salon: Free Hidden Object Mystery Game
name_original: Beauty Salon: Free Hidden Object Mystery Game
description:
"Beauty Salon" is made for all the Hidden Object and Salon lovers!
Pick out all salon products. Can you recognize them all ?

Find out all the secrets of beauty salons!!!!!

This AWESOME AND FREE Game Features:

ENDLESS SCENES OF HAIR & SPA SALONS FOR BEAUTY ADDICTS!

-20 Stunning Beautiful Levels

Find all unique objects in 20 beautifully crafted levels.

CHALLENGING GAMING MODES

-Timed Challenge & SUPER BLITZ MODE!

3 different but equally fun game modes! Try all of them and challenge your Hidden Object skills!

FINDING OBJECTS 3 DIFFERENT WAYS

-Pictures! A Kid Friendly Mode (or for a lesser challenge)

-Silhouettes! Challenging Silhouettes and Shadows!

-Traditional! We give you a word, you find the object!

See if you can search them all!

Forget all the point and click adventures and dive right into the fun world of Hidden Objects!

Download “Beauty Salon" NOW to explore and unlock the full adventure inside!

Wanna have more games? We would love to hear from you!

Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/BigBearEntertainmentGames
Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/Big_Bear_Entert
For more information about Big Bear Entertainment, please visit http://www.bigbearentertainment.net
